pages.title: Cardboard Box
pages.text: The cardboard box is available in 6 tiers. With each tier, the cardboard box is able to store more items.$(br)To put items into the cardboard box, place it down and right-click it. It can also be filled with hoppers or other means of item transportation.

Cardboard boxes can be automatically filled in the $(l:packaging/packager)packager$(/l).$(br)To submit a cardboard box, just break the block and put it into the $(l:drone_delivery/drone_pad)drone pad$(/l).
